tool_description: Query Target.com products by keywords, price info, store info and more.
name: Target
title: Target

api_list.name: /storeDetails
api_list.description: Get detailed info about an individual physical target store.

required_parameters.name: store_id
required_parameters.description: The store ID is the identifier of a physical target location. Use (nearbyStores) with a zip code to get a list of nearby store ID's

api_list.name: /nearbyStores
api_list.description:
Get nearby stores and store id's using a zip code as a parameter.
Optional parameters are, count, and radius miles, to filter how many stores you want to show and the distance in miles you want to search.

required_parameters.name: zip_code
required_parameters.description: physical store locations will be shown close to this zip code

optional_parameters.name: radius_miles
optional_parameters.description: The radius (in miles) that stores will be shown in relation to zip_code

optional_parameters.name: count_limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum amount of stores that will be shown in relation to distance from zip_code. The maximum value is 20.

api_list.name: /productDetails
api_list.description: Get detailed info about a specific target product using a TCIN (Target Catalog Identification Number).

required_parameters.name: TCIN
required_parameters.description: (Target Catalog Identification Number). Can be found using /searchByKeywords, or on target.com site.

required_parameters.name: store_id
required_parameters.description: The store ID is the identifier of a physical target location. Use (nearbyStores) with a zip code to get a list of nearby store ID's

api_list.name: /searchByKeywords

required_parameters.name: keywords
required_parameters.description: Search query used in targets search bar.

required_parameters.name: store_id
required_parameters.description: The store ID is the identifier of a physical target location. Use (/nearbyStores) with a zip code to get a list of nearby store ID's

optional_parameters.name: faceted_value
optional_parameters.description: facet_value is used to filter by color, brand, in-store, etc. The facet_value can be found in the response for each request. Separate the facet values with a capital (Z).  For example if you want to add the facet filters for (in-store only), the facet ID is (5zkty). If you want to filter for the paper towel brand (bounty), the facet ID is (56dll). if you want to use both filters, combine them for the facet_id: (5zktyZ56dll).

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Use this to start showing products after the offset number. This is a way to paginate.

optional_parameters.name: sort_by
optional_parameters.description: Pick one of the sort by's to choose how you want the results to sorted. (Case sensitive).

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: Maximum results that you want shown. Max is 28 for a single request. For more results, use (offset) and offset it by your current results.
